label: logicC:software_en
steps: [1] If the repository has a valid build configuration, then the CI server can run the build.
[2] If the CI server can run the build, then a build artifact is produced.
[3] If a build artifact is produced and deployment credentials are configured, then the application can be deployed to staging.
[5] The repository has a valid build configuration.
[6] For every module x, if a linter is configured for x, then lint results are available for x.
[7] A linter is configured for module a.
[8] For every module x, if lint results are available for x, then either x passes linting or x fails linting.
[9] The CI server can run the build (from [1] and [5]).
[10] A build artifact is produced (from [2] and [9]).
[11] The application can be deployed to staging (from [3] and [10] and [4]).
[12] For module a, lint results are available and either it passes linting or it fails linting (from [6],[7],[8]).
